stages.title: Define Your Civil Engineering Path
stages.description: Clarify your interests in structures, transportation, environmental, or geotechnical engineering.

Global.overview: Top civil engineering programs value strong math/physics, problem-solving, and interest in infrastructure. Identify your specialization early.
checklist: Research 5-7 top civil engineering programs (MIT, ETH Zurich, NUS, UC Berkeley, Cambridge)
Identify specialization (structures, transportation, environmental, geotechnical, water resources)
Map your math/physics preparation to program requirements
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting academics, projects, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, projects, and research. Combine academics with practical infrastructure work.
checklist: Complete AP Physics C and AP Calculus BC
Research reach, target, and safety schools for civil engineering

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, STEP/ENGAA, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for Cambridge, Imperial, etc.

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards.
checklist: Review mechanics topics in JEE/IB HL Physics
Document interest in civil engineering specializations

quiz.q: What do top civil engineering programs value?
opts: Strong math/physics, problem-solving, and infrastructure interest
quiz.correct: Strong math/physics, problem-solving, and infrastructure interest

stages.title: Build Engineering Projects & Skills
stages.description: Develop hands-on skills through structural design, modeling, and infrastructure projects.

Global.overview: Demonstrate civil engineering ability through tangible projects.
checklist: Complete a structural design project (bridge, building, etc.)
Learn CAD software (AutoCAD, Revit, or similar)
Build a physical model or prototype
Document project with drawings, calculations, and photos
projectIdeas: Design and build a model bridge
Create a structural analysis of a local building

US.overview: Link projects to competitions and summer programs.
checklist: Apply to civil engineering summer programs
Draft EPQ proposal on civil engineering topic

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate civil engineering skills?
opts: Design and build structural projects with documentation
quiz.correct: Design and build structural projects with documentation

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in mathematics, physics, and engineering coursework.

Global.overview: Strong math and physics preparation is essential.
checklist: Master statics, dynamics, and mechanics of materials
Complete AP Physics C and AP Calculus BC
Take strong SAT Math or ACT
Achieve A* in Mathematics and Physics

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for civil engineering?

stages.title: Craft Your Engineering Narrative
stages.description: Translate skills and projects into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your civil engineering passion and achievements.

checklist: Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App

quiz.q: What should your civil engineering statement highlight?
opts: Technical passion, structural projects, and problem-solving
quiz.correct: Technical passion, structural projects, and problem-solving

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

quiz.q: What's key for civil engineering interviews?
opts: Clear explanation of projects and structural concepts
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of projects and structural concepts
